Description:
Renovated 3 Bedroom Home!
Positioned on a 638m2 (approx) parcel of land within walking distance to shops, primary school, kindergarten and public transport, this home provides the perfect opportunity to invest or occupy!
Offering 3 bedrooms, 2 with built in robes, master with air conditioner, all with easy access to the updated family bathroom comprising bath, shower, vanity and toilet.
Striking floorboards feature to the open plan living and meals area which adjoins the renovated kitchen complete with stainless steel appliances including gas hotplates, electric underbench oven and dishwasher.
Outside offers a huge undercover entertainment area, spacious backyard and double garage. Currently tenanted at $270pw, this would make an ideal addition to your investment portfolio or a perfect first home!
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.
Insights: 96 Hendy Street, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Stunning Renovation
There’s simply nothing to do except move in, kick the feet up and thoroughly enjoy this tranquil home.
With an abundance of natural light beaming into the open-plan living area, 22 Coolidge Street truly offers comfortable and stylish living for the young couple or family.
Set on a generous allotment of some 620m2 approx., the home comprises;
• 3 spacious bedrooms; 2 with BIRs
• Expansive, open plan kitchen, living & dining with Tasmanian Oak flooring
• Cutting-edge kitchen with quality appliances, stone counter top & island bench, marble splash-back
• Ducted heating and cooling
• Modern bathroom with floor-to-ceiling tiles
• Powered single garage
Homes of this quality don’t last long; call now to arrange your private inspection.

Description:
Family entertainer.
From the moment you enter this property, the first impressions are of a much loved and cared for home. This charming brick veneer 3 bedroom home situated on a secure 557m2 allotment offers a wonderful opportunity for the first home buyer or neat investor.
Capitalise on this tidy home with a versatile floorplan comprising of 3 generous bedrooms, large living area with S/S A/C adjacent the practical kitchen with ample bench space & electric cooking. Moving further into the home you will find a renovated central bathroom and a separate laundry which provides access to the oversized undercover alfresco area in the rear yard.
Well presented & cared for, this property is a neat and tidy investment for all. Brilliantly located in close proximity to the Corio Shopping Centre, numerous schools for all ages, easily accessible public transport & just a short commute to Geelong's CBD.
This property boasts plenty of appeal for the Melbourne commuter with the Princes Highway & major amenities close by. A property with potential like this won't last long, you better be quick!

Description:
Attention first home buyers & investors.
Presenting a fantastic opportunity for first home buyers, families or investors with a keen eye for value. This neat three bedroom home on a 583m2 (approx.) allotment could be exactly what you've been waiting for. The home's functional floor plan comprises three comfortable bedrooms (two with BIR's), a spacious main living area with gas heater & a central bathroom complete with shower & bath plus laundry. The neat & updated kitchen offers ample bench space & ceiling fan overlooking the meals area. Enjoy the generous grassed rear yard perfect for entertaining family & friends. Location is ideal, just a short 2 minute commute to the Corio Shopping Centre, excellent schools for all ages nearby, easy access to public transport as well as close proximity to the Ring Road and Princes Highway. This home really does have it all!

Description:
742m2 (approx) allotment in court location.
Situated on a very impressive 742sqm approx. allotment this 3 bedroom residence is in a convenient court location and is suited to all buyers looking to secure a prime parcel of land for great value. Comprising of 3 bedrooms all with BIR's, comfortable living room, functional gully style kitchen & neat central bathroom with separate shower and bath. Air conditioning and a gas heater are present in the main living areas while outside sits a double garage & garden shed with plenty of yard still left over. Close proximity to reserves, schools and easy access to the Princes Highway & Ring Road makes this property an ideal investment opportunity. Currently tenanted for $245 pw, enquire today.
** Please note photos used for advertising were taken in 2016 please call to book an inspection to view home in current condition.

Description:
Position and potential.
Brimming with options to move straight in, renovate or recreate (STCA), this delightful home set on a corner allotment offers a relaxing family lifestyle just steps from parklands and the local shopping strip. Full of retro charm, this is an ideal opportunity for those wanting to secure their place in the Corio market or investors looking for a well maintained and neat home to add to their portfolio. Providing a comfortable and inviting lounge upon entrance, three bedrooms close by the central bathroom, practical kitchen and meals area as well as additional sunroom that allows access to the rear yard. Venturing outside you are greeted by a huge backyard perfect for entertaining family and friends in a peaceful garden setting as well as DLUG.
Located within walking distance to the Corio Shopping Centre, Schools for all ages and Stead Park. Centrally located this charming and much loved brick veneer home deserves your attention, enquire today before you miss out.

Description:
Spacious Family Home
Located in the sought after pocket of Rose Park, this 3 bedroom property offers a lot for a first home buyer, families and investors alike.
The home offers a great functional floor plan and consists of three bedrooms with built in robes (master with full ensuite and walk in robe), large front lounge which then leads through to a sunny open plan kitchen/dining and family room. The rear of the home has a spacious rumpus room perfect for a kids play area. Many extras in the home include gas central heating, split system A/C, alarm, water tank and a double remote garage.
The home is well located in a quiet court on a 591sqm allotment and has easy access to the Geelong Ring Road & Corio Shopping Centre just a short commute away all major amenities are close at hand. Do not miss your chance to secure this prime piece of real estate today!

Description:
An attractive investment.
Be impressed by this immaculately kept and maintained family home. Set on a lavish 608m2 (approx.) allotment that basks in natural light, creating a good sense of space and comfort. Providing an exceptional street presence this beautiful home epitomises style and has been designed with easy and convenient living in mind. Currently occupied to fantastic long term tenants for $350 pw this property is sure to spike interest from investors looking for a set and forget asset. Providing a warm and welcoming lounge upon entrance that flows effortlessly through to a 2nd living area close by the practical kitchen. 2 of the bedrooms (both with BIR's) are close by the gleaming central bathroom while the master suite, at the front of the residence, comes complete with WIR and ensuite. Secure off street parking is assured in the DLUG with internal access through the laundry and drive through roller doors to the backyard. Entertain family and friends in the far-reaching grassed year yard, fully fenced and a perfect place for children or pets to enjoy. Centrally located just a seconds stroll to Hendy Reserve the home provides easy access to public transport, primary schools, Ring Road and only a 2 minute drive to the Corio Shopping Centre. This outstanding opportunity to secure an attractive family residence in an established location won't last long.

Description:
Fresh, Bright and Move in Ready
A rare find for couples and young families as this property presents an ideal entry into an ever-popular location. This beautifully presented recently renovated home is sure to impress. The light filled stylish interior delivers a very functional floor plan; this property will not disappoint and all that remains for you to do, is sit back and relax.
One of the most compelling features of this home is how impeccably maintained it is. The family friendly floorplan boasts three bedrooms complete with built in robes and two of the three with ceiling fans. A renovated bathroom with single vanity, shower & bath with separate toilet and laundry. A well-presented kitchen equipped with gas cooktop, electric oven, large pantry with ample storage and a breakfast bar servery that flows throughout to the dining area, which meets a generous open plan living zone.
If entertaining is your thing, then this perfect family focused home is ready for immediate enjoyment, with a fully fenced generous back yard and undercover entertainment area.
Other highlights include split system and heating/cooling, double garage plus a long drive way for additional car accommodation and 2 rain water tanks with 8,000 litre storage with pump connected.
A perfect move-in ready family home or a great start to your portfolio - this home also has potential for a great rental return and in an area that’s only going to expand.
In an unbeatable position just, a blink from bustling Corio shopping precinct offering all the services you could want and need, public transport, schools, train station and easy access to the Ring Road, this is an irresistible opportunity for one savvy buyer. Inspect without delay!
Roncon Real Estate – An Agency like no other!

Description:
Spacious 4-bedroom family home
This charming spacious home within a highly desirable location will leave you breathless and if that doesn't. the affordable price surely will! Possibilities are endless and we will welcome all buyers to inspect.
Brick veneer home has abundance of natural beauty laced throughout with four bedrooms all with BIRS, open kitchen with gas stove, electric oven and dining area, 2 large living zones, bathroom with 2 separate toilets, laundry and a double carport all neatly hidden behind establish gardens and a secure high fence. Extra features consist of gas heating, A/C cooling and an open alfresco area.
Nestled on 590m2 block with a full-sized backyard for the kids to play. Close to Shopping Village, public transport, schools and parks.
Auction is 18/8/2018 @12:30pm. Call today!

Description:
Light, bright and spacious.
Effortlessly stylish this renovated three bedroom home set on a generous 736m2 (approx.) parcel of land provides an exciting opportunity for purchasers to secure an amazing home in a perfect location. Currently rented to fantastic long term tenants for an outstanding $305 pw. The generous floorplan boasts a spacious open plan living and meals area upon entrance combined with the sleek well equipped kitchen that provides gas cooking, dishwasher and large island bench. Down the main hall lies the three bedrooms all with BIR's adjacent the practical central bathroom with separate shower and bathtub. Outside secure parking is available in the DLUG as well as plenty of rear yard for entertaining or children and pets to enjoy. You will be delighted by this affordable residence set within walking distance to the Corio Shopping Centre that provides most major amenities as well as reserves, sporting facilities and primary schools. Offering stunning finishes throughout all the hard work has been completed for you, inspections are a must.

Description:
Presented in pristine condition.
Flaunting a light and bright interior with gleaming polished timber floorboards underfoot, a welcoming atmosphere and loads of natural light, it's the perfect place to enter the market or invest in your future. Presented in pristine condition so you can move straight in or lease it out without a worry in the world! Complete with three generous bedrooms all with built in robes, down the hall from the family sized central bathroom with separate shower and bath. The open planned lounge flows beautifully into the dining area overlooked by the well equipped kitchen that provides stainless steel 900mm oven. Boasting a magnificent undercover decked alfresco, seamless indoor outdoor entertaining is assured. The additional area provides a bar and comes complete with roll down blinds perfect for year round comfort. Secure parking is available in the large 9mX6m garage at the side of the property. Additional features include a powder room through the laundry, wood fire heater, split system air-conditioning and much more. Within walking distance to Hendy reserve, public transport, primary schools and child care facilities. Further major amenities such as the Corio Shopping Centre, The ring road and Corio Train station are just a few minutes' drive. This is a golden opportunity to enter the booming Corio market and secure an immaculate property today.
Photo ID Required

This lovely three bedroom home is ideal for first home buyers or families ready for you to move straight in and start unpacking, offering a functional floor plan for easy convenient living.

Description:
Solid investment in Growth Corridor
This Solid 3 bed, 1 bath, 2 car brick home set on 600 m2 block is a savvy investment or great first home. Situated in a growth corridor suburb of Corio and tenanted until Jan 2019 with a rent of $265 pw, this property is a must to inspect. Comprising of spacious front lounge room with solid hardwood floors, ceiling fan and Heat/AC for all year round comfort. A neat functional kitchen with SS appliances gas cooking and ample storage. There is also a small informal meals space seating up to 4 off the kitchen.
Down the hall you will find 3 good size bedrooms, two with BIR's, master at the rear which is spacious and offers great natural light, and large BIR. The central updated bathroom offers a separate shower, bath, new vanity and heat lamps for those cold mornings.
Outside you have an undercover pergola area ideal for entertaining and a large rear yard perfect for children / pets. This solid home makes for a foot in the door for a FHB or savvy investment with tenants in place and willing to stay.
FEATURES
600m2 block
Rev cycle Split System
Shedding
Potential rent $280 - $300 pw
Tenancy in place Jan 2019

Description:
Fresh Family Home - 626Mt2
This freshly updated three bedroom home, on a generous allotment of (approx) 626mt2, with all the hard work done for you so it is just ripe and ready for you to move straight into.
The home comprises three bedrooms, all with BIRs, updated contemporary central bathroom with walk in shower and luxurious bath. Spacious lounge upon entry with gas fireplace and modern neutral tones. The updated kitchen features 900mm electric oven, gas cooktop and separate meals area.
A great addition to the property is the large carport and garage, with adjoining workshop and games room. The rear yard itself offers an abundance of space with a large undercover pergola with exposed aggregate concrete for entertaining family and friends and a large cubby and play area for the kids.
Walking distance to public transport, local schools and just a 10 minute drive to the Geelong CBD and 50 minutes to Melbourne.
Don't miss the opportunity to inspect this very neat property, which is an absolute credit to the current owners!!

Situated within minutes from the Geelong Ring Road & Princes Highway for Melbourne/Geelong/Surf Coast commuters is this fantastic investment opportunity right in the heart of Corio. 5 minutes drive to Corio Village shopping centre and within walking distance to schools, kindergartens, shops & public transport at your doorstep, don't miss out on this partially renovated 4 bedroom, 1 bathroom property set on a large 657m2 block (approx.)

Description:
Delightful, modern and spacious.
Sophisticated presentation and spacious design provides a wonderful family lifestyle at this three bedroom property. Currently occupied to wonderful long term tenants at $350pw this charming brick veneer home is sure to appeal to investors searching for a neat property in a quiet court location. Upon Entrance you will be struck by the warm inviting style and floor plan designed to please with a flood of natural light that enhance the home's welcoming warmth. Enjoy a generous sense of space inside and outside. This property is modern and stylish throughout with open living areas, a well equipped kitchen with stainless steel oven and a servery-style outlook of the main living area. A formal lounge off the front entry flows into the dining room before opening into the casual living zone, where there is access to the secure and private large yard. An impressive alfresco provides a terrific entertaining atmosphere with full shelter from the elements and lots of space for the bbq and outdoor furniture. The surrounds are well maintained and feature covered parking for up to three cars. This beautiful home sits on a big size block of 593m2 (approx.) in a priceless location, just a moments' drive away from the Corio Shopping Centre, multiple schools for all ages, reserves and the Geelong Ring Road. This is a great opportunity to buy a lovely family home with everything you need close by.
PLEASE NOTE: The photos advertised are from the previous sale of the property in 2016. Please be sure to book and inspection to view the home in the current condition.
